00020 #include <fstream>

00029 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {

00031         
00032 RDK2_FACTORY(RPropertyUpdate);
00033     
00034 RDK2::Object* RPropertyUpdate::clone() const
00035 {
00036     RPropertyUpdate* p = new RPropertyUpdate;
00037     p->completeUrl = this->completeUrl;
00038     p->type = this->type;
00039     p->object = object ? object->clone() : 0;
00040     return p;
00041 }
00042 
00043 RPropertyUpdate::RPropertyUpdate() : completeUrl(""), type(VALUE), object(0) { }
00044 
00045 RPropertyUpdate::~RPropertyUpdate()
00046 {
00047     delete object;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void RPropertyUpdate::read(Reader* r) throw (RDK2::ReadingException)
00051 {
00052     r->startReading(getClassName());
00053         completeUrl = r->readString();
00054         type = (Type) r->read_i32();
00055         object = (RDK2::Object*) r->readObject();
00056     r->doneReading();
00057 }
00058 
00059 void RPropertyUpdate::write(Writer* w) const throw (RDK2::WritingException)
00060 {
00061     if(!object)
00062         throw WritingException("Cannot serialize RPropertyUpdate with null payload.");
00063         
00064     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00065         w->writeString(completeUrl);
00066         w->write_i32(type);
00067         w->writeObject(true, object);
00068     w->doneWriting();
00069 }
